38740245.review: there's just something about side scroller shoot-em up' games that just stick very well, being made and done to death they just keep coming out with more and more similar style games that will never not be fun. I haven't had a lot of time put into this one, but I can assure you if you're a phantom of the side scrollers then this will cure that itch for something different. it works very well on the couch and steam controller as well, so don't be shy on trying to kick back and play this one on a controller. of course, mouse and keyboard is the precision to be the best, with the highest of scores to keep your friends coming back for more.

38641696.review:
Pure racism. You are pink and they are blue. You get a gun to eradicate them. Just awful.

On a serious note, this is a interesting take on a twin stick shooter.

When you kill enemies, their bodies turn to bones. Which then pile up, making the level have a different terrain. It's not really good or bad, but it is defintely interesting and could make an amazing game if the dev's decide to expand on that idea.

On the same note as making bone mountains, you can blow up the ground and have dips. This is only really important on the lava level, because the lava hurts you. More importanlty, it hurts the braindead blue guys because they run straight into it if they're chasing you. 

Sadly, the dips and mountains don't seem to actually affect the gun fire. There's a chance it does, but the game is so fast and hectic that you won't notice a bullet or two hitting the mountain instead of a random blue guy anyway.

All in all, this game is worth a buck. 

PS:Ii watched the trailer. It made me uncomfortable. Don't watch it.

36108570.review:
Being the cheapsest buy in my Library, I can say with 100% certainty this game is one of the few titles I've played and didn't regret the money. Just for 29 RUB(or whatever the hell your currency is; it's cheap anyways) you get a short but action-packed undead-killing and corpse-piling shoot-'em-up, where you have to quickly adapt to the enemy attacks and the constant change of terrain. Thankfully, the physics in Battle Bruise have no sense of self-respect, and thus you can sometimes hit the zombies while standing on the highground and shooting horizontally. Simply glorious.

The few downsides are that the game has no endless mode or multiplayer, and it's quite short, you can easily beat it on one night. But still, it is worth the lack of sleep.

10/10 can't wait for the sequel.

35740829.review: I've seen some good 1 dollar games through the years (recommending Battle High 1 and 2 on XBLIG), and Battle Bruise is no exception. This top-down shooter is proven to have plenty of fun in a low, low price. Gameplay consists of 2 main modes with several levels and 2 different weapon sets: a main Campaign with three waves per level and a Car Defense mode with 8 waves per level. Campaign is all about surviving a horde of zombies while car defense is as it's named (and can be brutal at times). Inbetween waves you can spend some money getting new weapons and upgrading current ones (and buy turrets in car defense). During the course of these swarmfest there are power-ups that can help make things easier (note that Freeze only affects the enemies that have spawned at the moment it's picked up). What's also neat is that enemy corpses can fill the landscape and change the terrain everyone walks on. Not to mention it can be reduced by either explosions, the Nuke, elephants or the dashng slash. Controls are as simple as a PC shooter can be (WASD move, mouse aim and fires, numbers and scroll wheel selects weapons), but I do like the addition of a dashing slash (right click) that can help you get out of being crowded. What's sad is that although the game recognize my 360 controller I can't aim with the right stick. That needs to be fixed. The visuals are pretty basic with a nice art style. It's got that cool art style like it came from a punk kid's notebook. The audio's pretty good too. Although my only major gripe is how weak some sounds can be. But what got me intrigued is the dynamic music. The tunes sounded basic at first, but as more zombies flood the battlefield, they kick it up a notch, bringing out guitars, keyboards, etc. It's not often you find a game with dynamic music, especially from a 1 dollar game. Overall, I think it's definitely worth the dollar.

35730261.review: Fun shoot'em up.  Has a nice amount of enemy variants and is challenging for a simple concept.  Love the "corpse mountain" mechanic and can see a lot of replay value in the game.  WELL WORTH the 99 cents!  One game I would absolutely recommend worth the full price and worth buying a copy for a friend.

全成就撒花,这款小品级游戏用来消遣还算不错,价格也合适.  比较意外的是通关后居然还有段小剧情动画.

游戏缺点：
1.敌人种类过少（5种+boss)，且各种类之间特色不显著.
2.武器平衡性有些差,例如游戏中的狙击枪升至满级也不是很好用.
3.部分场地连续几回合鏖战后地面严重凹凸不平会导致人物被环境遮挡,影响操作体验.

游戏技巧：
1.由于机制的问题，默认武器子弹数量低时敌人死亡必出弹药补给（所以可以利用这点给其他武器刷子弹）
2.车防模式只要安装第二种导弹即可轻松过关(2号导弹过于强力).

34896152.review:
Battle Bruise is an exceptionally good game for an exceptionally low price.  I got the game for 27 cents.  The game is very easy to pick up.  You have two choices when starting the game, campaign or car mode.  In campaign you have to fight off waves of enemies from all directions; 8 waves in total per stage.  After each wave you can buy different weapons and upgrade your current weapons.  I car defense mode, you have to protect a car from being destroyed.  In this mode you can also buy turrets to place on your car which makes it quite a bit easier.  I beat the game in about 4 hours over a few days.

Bottome line: if you need a 4 hour time waster for a dollar and enjoy shooter games you will probably enjoy this game.

Fun gameplay, extremely cheap and pretty decent music = 9/10.

Battle Bruise è un gioco che mi ha stupito, soprattutto per via della meccanica di poter modificare l'ambiente di gioco (se pur ristretto) creando sia rilievi che depressioni: un'idea semplicemente geniale ed innovativa. Peccato però che il gameplay può risultare parecchio noioso e ripetitivo, nonostante la gran varietà di armi disponibili e la difficoltà di determinati livelli. Riguardo alla grafica, non riesco a capire se la combinazione tra ambiente 3D e personaggi 2D sia fantastica oppure abominevole (suppongo che ciò sia soggettivo).
Forse per 0,99 euro non ne vale la pena... ma, se acquistato con i saldi o con un coupon, può rivelarsi un buon acquisto che vi impegnerà qualche ora.

33845673.review:
[h1] 地形が変化する見下ろし方シューティング [/h1]

猫人間を操作し迫りくるゾンビ共を倒せ

[h1] ゲーム内容 [/h1]

キャンペーンモードと車を守るタワーディフェンスモードがあり、どちらもWave単位で終わり、稼いだお金で武器を買ったり強化できる、ゾンビを倒すと死体が積もり山ができたり、爆風などで足場が崩れたりする地形変化が結構斬新、それ以外は基本的に他の見下ろし方と同じ、敵はランダムでお金や弾数、回復を落とす、他にはランダムでマップにパワーアップや画面上の敵の移動速度低下させる、ミサイルを落とすなどのアイテムも落ちている、タワーディフェンスモードには武器以外にもタレットも買え設置できるようになっている。

[h1] 個人的に思った事や感想 [/h1]

ボリューム的にはそこまでないが、定価で買っても損しない位面白い、タワーディフェンスモードは3種類のタレットの内2種類が強く、2種類のタレットだけを追加していって余ったら初期銃の強化だけで余裕で最後までクリアできる、逆にタレットなしだときつすぎる、縛りプレイが好きならタレットなしでクリアとかもいいかもしれない。

33795324.review: Das Spiel ist einfach nur klasse. Es ist fordernd und wird nur schwer langweilig. Ich habe es für 0,25€ gekauft. 0,99€ ist aber immernoch ein fairer preis.

33730534.review:
• Inexpensive casual fun with pluses that will exceed your expectations.
• Impressive sound work and soundtrack.
• Liza, the pink-haired cat protagonist, is cool and adds a lot of character and uniqueness to this game amidst tons of games with generic protagonists.
• The terrain mechanic is an interesting twist in the genre. Together with the enemy diversity, weapons and power-ups it adds depths of strategy and difficulty worth the praise.
• Gotta love the craziness of the inclusion of mammals into an apocalyptic background and they aren't there just for laughs, they play a part interacting with the terrain.
• Trading cards make it even more worthy! The Liza emoticons are amazing.

Battle Bruiseeee!!!

33527919.review:
This game makes me wish the review system had a "neutral" recommendation button. It is interesting graphic wise. It is decent fun for its size. The changing geography of the map is a super interesting mechanic... However... There's very few types of enemies, the balancing is attrocious, the game does nothing to explain anything, it is also very short.
If it eventually has some overhauling patch that adds some permanent upgrades, more stages, balancing, etc, this game gets strongly recommended. For now, however, it is only worth it if it is not full price and you can at least make your money back with the cards and get some easy achievements.

33463806.review:
For $0.34 (Had a 66% off coupon) It's not a bad little arcade shooter. Even for $0.99 it's a pretty good deal. Unfortunately there's not really much to the game. There's like 6-7 different weapons (If you don't count Lvl.1-3 as different weapons) between two game-types (Campaign and Car Defense) A limited variety of enemies (Maybe like 4 total unless I'm forgetting one) And there's practically no 'options' Just Resolution and Fullscreen.

All-in-all, it's not a bad deal for $0.99 and it's something you can launch and get into quickly and easily if you needed to kill like 5-10 minutes with some mindless action.

That being said, with a little more work, this could [u][i]easily[/i][/u] be a $4.99 game, but it is what it is.

Oh yeah and for bonus points, the art is interesting and the music isn't half bad.

33405714.review: Отличный 2D экшен. Очень дёшево стоит. Отлично убивает время. Соблюдена своего рода эстетика дизайна, что меня и привлекло. Советую приобрести, не будет лишним в вашей библиотеке.

很简单的射击小品游戏，不停杀僵尸得钱，买武器炮塔不停杀更多僵尸。游戏风格比较独特，创意不错，就是实在做的太粗糙太粗糙了，尤其是每次把地图打的坑坑洼洼，镜头就晃的不成样子，而且有坑之后，人走进去，就感觉像是跑到贴图外面去了，根本看不见，任务动作移动方面做得实在是粗糙，如果能改善下操作感，游戏还是不错的，不过价格也不贵，但是如果操作感上去了，价格提高点也是能接受的。

另外我是为了拿全成就，耐心点，全成就不算难。

32984403.review:
In this game you take the role of a noble pink-haired Run-Gun cat heroine named Féline D'akka who tries to stop an invasion of Zombies.

Okay, enough with the jokes, this is basically Z.O.R.M. (Zombie Storm) on LSD, DMT and 3 crates of Templar beer. (Pink elephants included) Lots of things to kill and their corspes are so permanent they even start rotting and pile up, soon enough you'll find yourself on a mount-everest of burnt Heretics, killed Mutants and purged Xenos.

The main focus is crowd-control, wich is pretty well executed, altough in the Lava level a jump button would be appreciated if you just nuked the shit out of the map, leaving lava pools everywhere.

You can buy upgrades, one part of me wishes them to be permanent, the other likes the extra difficulty of repurchasing all  your weapons. 

The only downside is the shortage of weapons, wich is easily overloked, more guns aren't a must, but I'd like some more. Like maybe a Plasma Cannon and a flamethrower.

For what it is you can give it a solid 10/10 especially now on sale.

32895399.review: Este juego es una obra maestra <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3  adictivo y ideal para sacarte todo el estres de encima. Es bastante sencillo pero con una estetica muy buena, adoro a esa gata!

32325994.review: This is like a newgrounds game on steroids. The amount of content and levolution that comes with this game is well worth the price. The programmers, designer and soundtrack developer should all be pretty proud. I'd rate this game an 8/10. Solid work and lotta fun!

32314358.review:
Good bargain for its price.


It's traditional "Alien shooter-like" with interesting "corpse pill-up" mechanic.
Basically when enemy got killed, they turn into "floor" and will pill up into hill when enough enemy is kill in that area and player can walk on the hill and feel like a badass.
The interesting part is that some weapons can be 'blocked' by this 'hill' so player can't just stay still or they may not be able to shoot.

Another one is that some weapons and enemy attack or pick up will destory these 'corpse hill' and floor too (the under-flood maybe water which slow you down or lava which deal damage to player, enemy can also submerge in them so player may not know what's under them and could got ambushed) . This add tactical decision on how to move around, what weapon to use (not just the most DPS since it may destroy terrain or blocked by hill), and where to kill the enemy. It makes the game feel much more 'fresh' and 'active' than other run-n-gun shooter.

Overall, I recommend it.

32238727.review:
Клёвая убивалка времяни!

32226658.review: I'll admit I'm not one for shooters where your put in an arena and forced to shoot down a bunch of enemies. Not that its bad just that I feel they never have enough depth. Granted there are a few technical glitches but it never distracts from the game and I love the aesthetic.

32212988.review: Battle Bruise é um game de arena, top down shooter, 2.5D com elementos 2D e 3D, trilha sonora muito boa, divertido, no inicio parece um jogo muito fácil, mas depois da primeira fase começa a ficar mais insano, sistema de evolução de armas muito legal e a montanha de corpos que vai formando ou buraco formado por bombas influencia bastante no jogo o que torna o jogo mais dificil e divertido, recomendo pra quem curte jogos desse tipo!

32212100.review: Battle Bruise is a simple yet fun game. The visuals seem to be taken straight out of some downtown graphitti, and that's pretty cool - it fits with the awesome soundtrack very much! While I'm not that much into simple pick-up-and-play games, Battle Bruise gave me some good fun, skillfully dodging waves of undead enemies. Ah, and do expect some random difficulty spikes - mostly RNG things. This is the most fun you can get for a price tag like this!

32169547.review:
フレンドさんが購入したゲームの中にあったので、スクリーンショットを見てみようとチェックしたら、結構面白そうなので買ってみました。
かなり爽快感あるゲームです。マシンガン系でもショットガン系でも一気に敵をつぶす事ができるので、所謂強武器が偏ってないので、自分好みの武器で遊べるのが楽しいです。
操作もFPSに慣れてる方なら、おなじみの操作なので、特に新しく操作を覚える事なくスムーズに遊べると思うのでウォレットの中の余りがあるなら購入してみるのもよいと思ういます。

32151617.review: Pretty fun game where you kill hordes of zombies in an arcade style arena. Also, it's got some pretty great dinamic terrain mechanics.

32142034.review: Pretty good, reminds me of piles of zhits I kill in the Vietnam War. Funny to see 20% off to buy each weapons in the UH-1 Huey, this thing was really important for me, because I cant collect too much coins while busy like that haha. 32130552.review: Battle Bruise is a unique Shoot 'Em Up, with a rocky/HQ vibe. Great weapons, fun enemies and a lots of terrain distortions! Great game!

31773197.review:
[h1]O que é?[/h1]
Eis que esbarro em um shooter 2.5D (cenário de 3D, sprites de personagens em 2D) de top view feito na engine "Unity" que é uma sequencia espiritual de um jogo de flash, "Pothead Zombies".

O jogo tu atira, faz upgrades nas armas, atira, deixa pilhas e pilhas de cadáveres que mudam a profundidade da superfície dinamicamente, atira, Pega power-ups irados (eu já disse que eu atira também?).

Com um estilo de arte trash, lembrando desenhos de caderno de ensino médio, muito semelhante ao game "Draw to Death".
(com uma trilha sonora bem legal, diga-se de passagem)

[h1]Resumo[strike]para leigos [/strike] [/h1]

BATTLE BRUUUUUUSE!!!!!

POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW

NUUUUUUUUUKE!

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!

POW! CHU-CLACK POW! CHU-CLACK POW! CHU-CLACK POW! CHU-CLACK

FREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEZEEE!

(não sei uma onomatopéia equivalente a congelamentos)

RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGE!

Tak...  Tak..  Tak.  TAk TAK TAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAKTAK
(ligando motor da Minigun)

CORRE VÉI QUE VEM O JEGUE EXPLOSIVO!!!!!!!!!!

[h1]Veredito[/h1]

Apesar do jogo ainda estar simples e bem limitado, me surpreendo com o fato que dos desenvolvedores tem bom humor. Na opção de fechar o jogo, diz "Tu pode dar um Alt + F4, sabia?" ele jus a frase [b]"This game isn't messy. It's MESS ITSELF!"[/b] de uma forma estilosa e bem cômica. Os efeitos sonoros são de boa qualidade e não se repetem, o game foi feito por um pessoal com experiência isso posso ter certeza.

Se realmente vale a pena, eu digo que sim. Futuras atualizações poderão ainda adicionar mais conteúdo para o game com o tempo, mais o fato de eu ter lucrado com a venda das "cartinhas" o triplo do valor do próprio game. Tem muito jogo nessa plataforma de 10 ~ 15 Reais que não proporciona a metade da diversão de Battle Bruise. Melhores 2 pila e pouco que já gastei no full price da minha vida, sem zoeira.

31763661.review:
Безумное мочилово зомбаков с двумя режимами игры.

https://youtu.be/TXic4R1jYJc

1 режим - ВЫЖИВАНИЕ;
Задача - выжить и уничтожить всех зомби
В каждом уровне 3 волны, новый уровень начинаем со стандартной пушкой, собираем с убитых зомби монетки и между волнами закупаемся новыми пушками.

2 режим - ЗАЩИТА МАШИНЫ
Задача - не дать зомбакам уничтожить машину и выжить самому.
В каждом уровне 8 волн, между валнами помимо покупки оружия для вас, вы можете приобрести турели и установить их на машину.

Графика в игре довольно симпатичная, все герои в рисованном стиле. Музыка в стиле тяжелого рока, что очень даже гармонируется к игре данного типа.

Из бонусов есть достижения и коллекционные карточки, а самый приятный момент - это минимальная цена. Сложность игры средняя, поэтому вполне реально пройти игру полностью и добавить в свою библиотеку "идеальную" игру.

Еще вы можете посмотреть обзоры на другие игры:
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25737869/
Так же подписывайтесь на нашу группу с халявными раздачами:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/freeekeys

31540042.review: It is a topdown shooter with Zimbres (from Zenardi and Lisa (makers of Pothead Zombies)) comic style. The piles of dropped enemies change the ground shape and can create walkable areas in some levels. If you liked the trailers or Zimbres comic style, check this one. There is also a "car defense mode" that adds some tower defense elements to the survival topdown vibe.
